mapper.insert: insert into one( no, one_title, one_content, one_pwd, one_date, ord_no, member_no, one_type_code, qna_status_code ) values( seq_one.nextval, #{one_title}, #{one_content}, #{one_pwd}, sysdate, null, #{member_no}, #{one_type_code}, #{qna_status_code})
mapper.update: update one set no=#{no}, one_title=#{one_title}, one_content=#{one_content}, one_pwd=#{one_pwd}, one_date=sysdate, ord_no=null, member_no=#{member_no}, one_type_code=#{one_type_code}, qna_status_code=#{qna_status_code} where no=#{no}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from one
where one_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or one_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
